Related works
Provenance
1621 to 1622Possibly in collection of Nicolaes Cornelis Cheeus (as "schilderye Lanschap Sint-Jans Predicatie gedaen by Jan Bruegel")
Until 1691Belgium AntwerpEither this painting or the Basel version (Ertz 257) was in various Antwerp collections until 1691 (in a 1691 inventory it is explicitly said to be "naer syn vader")
